1.0.name: wordpress/rjw-thinglink
1.0.description:
A simple plugin that allows users to connect their entire blog to their Thinglink account.

What is Thinglink you ask? It's a very simple, online tool that allows you to easily create clickable tags to any image on the web and share those tagged images on social networks. It's perfect for any publishers, brands, and bloggers who are looking to attach a few extra notes to each image.
